headline: Altria Delivers 7.2% EPS Growth in 1H25 Despite Sales Headwinds
summary: MO's first half of 2025 EPS grows 7.2% to $2.67 despite revenue declines, as pricing, efficiency gains and buybacks lifted margins and returns.

headline: Why Long-Term Investors Favor Altria Group (MO) Among Safest High Dividend Stocks
summary: Altria Group, Inc. (NYSE:MO) is included among the 10 Safest High Dividend Stocks to Buy Now. Altria Group, Inc. (NYSE:MO) is a major tobacco company with well-known brands including Marlboro, Copenhagen, Black & Mild, Skoal, and Parliament, among others.
